original_title: American Gunmaker: The John M. Browning Story
overview: Discover the remarkable life of John Moses Browning with host Fess Parker as he spans three generations of the Browning family to tell this fascinating story. With over 100 firearms patents to his credit, Browningâ€™s inventive genius spanned six decades and included many legendary pistol, rifle and shotgun designs for Winchester, Remington, Colt, Fabrique Nationle and others. The Browning name is still synonymous with the automatic pistols, rifles, machine guns and cannons used by the United States and her allies through al of the major world conflicts of the last century, and several Browning designs continue to defend freedom around the globe today.
title: American Gunmaker: The John M. Browning Story
